caption: Chuck Howley
infobox-image: refer to caption | Signed photo of Howley with the Cowboys

Career highlights and awards: Super Bowl champion (VI) | Super Bowl MVP (V) | 5× First-team All-Pro (1966-1970) | Second-team All-Pro (1971) | 6× Pro Bowl (1965-1969, 1971) | Dallas Cowboys Ring of Honor | 3× All-SoCon (1955-1957)
